name: Susannah's Lesson - A Stephen King Fan Film
blurb: See how Roland of Gilead interacts with his new Gunslinger student, wheel-chair-ridden Susannah Dean.

name: The Gamers: Dorkness Rising Definitive Blu-Ray Edition
blurb: In all its Flaming Hand of Fiery Doom glory, the Dead Gentlemen are bringing The Gamers: Dorkness Rising to Blu-Ray.

name: Mythica 2: The Darkspore - starring Kevin Sorbo
blurb: The 2nd film in the epic Mythica saga, the largest indie fantasy project ever. Follow the continuing adventures of Marek and her team.

name: Dracula is not Dead
blurb: Dracula, a fashion guru in Paris, is dying. He's presenting his last collection, assisted by a court of attractive and creepy vampires.

name: Strowlers Preludes: Ireland & Mongolia
blurb: Two magical short films—set within a shared cinematic universe—from Zombie Orpheus, the producers of JourneyQuest & The Gamers.

name: To Patch A Broken Star- Pilot
blurb: A cinematic VIRTUAL REALITY experience, which explores the afterlife from the perspective of a young boy named Eshi.

name: The Huldra: Short film "Heim" (Home)
blurb: "Heim" is a short film about finding home with one's self - partly set in the world of the Norwegian folklore creature The Huldra.

name: Porcelain
blurb: How much of yourself are you willing to give up in order to get what you want?

name: Tavern Brawl: A Tabletop RPG Inspired Fantasy Series
blurb: A tavernkeep desperately tries to stop incoming adventurers from tearing his establishment apart.

name: Baelin's Route - An Epic NPC Man Adventurer
blurb: A short-film following Baelin the Fisherman as he walks his scripted route around Azerim in the world of Epic NPC Man

name: Saltcoats - A queer fable
blurb: A modern-day fable, blending social realism and dark folklore to tell a powerful coming-of-age story.

name: Nightmares and Lullabies: an Original Mini-Series
blurb: Right before his 18th birthday, a young man escapes from his foster home with his little brother: only to face his nightmares head-on.

name: Fable
blurb: Three witch siblings begin the next phase of their immortal life. A orphanage with kids that have no imagination or magic. Until now.

name: Song of the Selkie
blurb: A short film set in Scotland, based on the folklore and legend of Kópakonan (the Seal Woman).

name: "So when do we start?" A Fantasy short film
blurb: A short films inspired by the deluxloy tumblr story about a someone who makes a deal with a Faeire and tricks them.

name: DesiQuest
blurb: A high-quality actual play Dungeons & Dragons show featuring an all South Asian cast, led by GM Jasmine Bhullar, dir by Sandeep Parikh
